cannot-edit: <font color="#7C0A02">Cannot edit waypoints you do not own!</font>
cannot-delete: <font color="#7C0A02">Cannot delete waypoints you do not own!</font>
cannot-save: <font color="#7C0A02">Cannot save waypoints you do not own!</font>
mapmarkers:name: Name
mapmarkers:not-saved-warning: Auto Map Marker settings not saved: Settings included invalid colors or names.
mapmarkers:custom-gui-description: Configure hotkeys for these markers in the game settings menu (Esc > Settings > Controls).
mapmarkers:copy-setting-to-all-traders: Copy Icon and Color from "{0}" to All
mapmarkers:mark-style-interact: Mark map by interacting with object
mapmarkers:mark-style-sneak: Mark map by sneaking while looking at object
mapmarkers:show-chat-message: Show chat message when new map marker is added
mapmarkers:enable-custom-hotkeys: Enable hotkeys to add customizable map markers
mapmarkers:enable-delete-hotkey: Enable hotkey to delete nearest map marker
mapmarkers:show-chat-message-on-delete: Show chat message when nearest map marker is deleted
mapmarkers:show-chat-message-hotkey-tool: After enabling this option, you can configure hotkeys in game settings (Esc > Settings > Controls)
mapmarkers:disable-mod: Temporarily disable the Auto Map Markers mod
mapmarkers:re-enable-mod: Click to enable the Auto Map Markers mod
mapmarkers:server-warning: Auto Map Markers mod was unable to connect to the server, and may not work as expected. If you are on a multiplayer server, the mod needs to be installed on the server to function.
